Entities.Name: General Fall History
Entities.Definition: Mentions of any past falls experienced by the patient, regardless of specific timing.

Entities.Name: Fall History within 2 Weeks
Entities.Definition: Mentions of a fall occurring within 14 days prior to the date of the clinical note.

Entities.Name: Fall History within 2 Days
Entities.Definition: Mentions of a fall occurring within 48 hours before the clinical note date.

Entities.Name: Fall Prevention Interventions
Entities.Definition: Interventions or precautions documented to prevent patient falls.

Entities.Name: Fall Risk
Entities.Definition: Mentions that describe the patient as being at risk of falling due to health or physical status.

Dataset.Name: Homecare Visit Notes Corpus
Dataset.Description: A corpus of 1,149,586 homecare visit notes from 89,459 patients in a large U.S. homecare agency (2015). Used for training and evaluating fall-related information extraction using both rule-based and NimbleMiner systems.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Annotations were performed using both a rule-based NLP system (regular expressions + negation detection) and NimbleMiner (word embedding-based term discovery with human-in-the-loop). Simclins (similar clinical terms) were iteratively reviewed and refined for labeling using positive-only label learning. Negation terms were excluded using the NegEx algorithm.
